com.illcode.meterman.impl

Class BasicWorldManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.illcode.meterman.impl.BasicWorldManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityActionsProcessor, GameActionListener, TurnListener

    public class BasicWorldManager
extends Object
implements GameActionListener, EntityActionsProcessor, TurnListener
    A manager (global listener for various game events) that handles basic world interactions, namely
    • Taking and dropping items.
    • Wearing and taking off wearables.
    • Equipping and unequipping equippables.

      • saveTo

        public void saveTo(Map<String,Object> worldData)
        Save this instance into a world-data map.

      • retrieveFrom

        public static BasicWorldManager retrieveFrom(Map<String,Object> worldData)
        Retrieve the BasicWorldManager instance stored by saveTo(Map) from worldData.

      • register

        public void register()
        Registers the BasicWorldManager with the GameManager, and saves the instance in the world-data.

        This should be called in Game.start(boolean) when a new game is started.

      • deregister

        public void deregister()
        De-registers this BasicWorldManager from the GameManager.

        It does not remove the reference to the instance from the world data, so that the instance be retrieved later on and re-registered without losing state.

      • processEntityActions

        public void processEntityActions(Entity e,
                        List<String> actions)
        Description copied from interface: EntityActionsProcessor
        Called when an entity's action list is being generated.
        Specified by:
        processEntityActions in interface EntityActionsProcessor
        Parameters:
        e - entity
        actions - the mutable list of actions that should be shown in the UI, It will be passed along to any other registered EntityActionsProcessorS before being displayed.

      • processAction

        public boolean processAction(String action,
                    Entity e,
                    boolean beforeAction)
        Description copied from interface: GameActionListener
        Called when an action is sent to the selected entity
        Specified by:
        processAction in interface GameActionListener
        Parameters:
        action - action name
        e - selected entity
        beforeAction - true if the method is being called before the action has reached the entity; false if it is called after
        Returns:
        true to indicate that this listener processed the action, and to prevent further processing; false to continue the processing chain.

        Description copied from interface: TurnListener
